section.title: System requirements
section.para: &MiKTeXCurrentSeries; will run on all &Windows; variants with the exception of &Windows95; and &WindowsNT;.

section.title: New: &XeTeX;
section.para: Another Unicode-capable &TeX; engine, &XeTeX; version 0.996-patch1, has been integrated into the &MiKTeX; distribution. &XeTeX; might become your favorite &TeX; engine if you need easy access to &Windows; fonts, or if you want to typeset non-western scripts.
